name: WibbleQuest
description:
A short, simple game where you play as a small wobbly creature named Oro, who embarks on a warrior's pilgrimage on a small island to test their mettle.

~~~

A quick practice game made in the span of about 3 months, I would have been faster if I wasn't so distracted by other stuff haha...

It doesn't have too much to it, just run around and poke (and maybe dodge or heal). You can see all the controls from the main menu and change them if you'd like.

I have not play tested much, so it's probably extremely rough around the edges.

~~~

Music is by The Wilted Lotus:

-Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/thewiltedlotus

-Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/thewiltedlotus

Please support them! They're real cool.
